overview: (2004):  1. Interview - 2. YOUR WILDEST DREAMS - 3. HEARTBEAT (Buddy Holly) - 4. TUESDAY AFTERNOON - 5. THE ACTOR -  6. ENGLISH SUNSET - 7. WHO ARE YOU NOW - 8. NEVER COMES THE DAY - 9. FOREVER AUTUMN - 10. DRIFTWOOD -  11. NIGHTS IN WHITE SATIN - 12. QUESTION  Bonus material recorded for this release: 13. NEW HORIZONS - 14. I DREAMED LAST NIGHT - 15. ONE LONELY ROOM - 16. BLESS THE WINGS - 17. VOICES IN THE SKY - 18. BLUE WORLD - 19.THE DAY WE MEET AGAIN - 20. IN MY WORLD
title: An Audience with Justin Hayward
